SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AudioPlayer
The AudioPlayer class manages loading and accessing audio files.
Cannon
Represents a Cannon tower in the game.
Cannonball
Represents a cannonball projectile fired by a cannon tower.
DamageType
Enum representing the types of damage that can be inflicted by projectiles in the game.
Dummy
The Dummy class represents a preview of a tower before placement on the map.
Fireball
Represents a fireball projectile fired by a tower in the game.
Flag
The Flag class represents a flag on the game map, used to define the path that monsters follow.
Game
The main class that controls the game flow.
Game.STATE
The current state of the game.
GameObject
An abstract class representing a game object.
Handler
The Handler class manages game objects and updates their state.
HPComparator
A comparator implementation that compares monsters based on their health points (HP).
HUD
The HUD class represents the heads-up display in the game.
ID
Enum for separation of game objects based on their Game.Game.ID
KeyInput
Handles user keyboard input.
Mage
Represents a Mage tower in the game.
Map
The Map class represents the game map, including the background image, path, and spawner for monsters.
MapData
Represents data associated with a map in the game.
MapStatus
The MapStatus enum represents the current status of the game map.
Menu
Represents the menu interface of the game.
Monster
Represents a monster in the game.
Ninja
Represents a Ninja tower in the game.
Path
The Path class represents the path that monsters follow on the game map.
PauseMenu
The PauseMenu class represents the pause menu in the game.
ProgressionComparator
A comparator implementation that compares monsters based on their progression.
Projectile
Abstract class representing a projectile fired by a tower in the game.
Shuriken
Represents a shuriken projectile fired by a tower in the game.
Sidebar
The Sidebar class represents the user interface sidebar in the game.
Slime
Represents a Slime monster in the game.
Snake
Represents a Snake monster in the game.
Spawner
The Spawner class manages the spawning of waves of monsters on the map.
SpawnNode
The SpawnNode class represents a node in a wave indicating when and what monster to spawn.
Spider
Represents a Spider monster in the game.
Tower
An abstract class representing a Tower in the game.
Tower.SHOOTING_STYLE
Shooting style of the tower
Type
Enumerates the special types of monsters in the game.
UI
The UI class serves as a base class for user interface elements in the game.
Upgradebar
The Upgradebar class represents the user interface for upgrading towers in the game.
Wave
The Wave class represents a wave of monsters that are spawned during gameplay.
Window
The Window class creates the main window for the game.
Worm
Represents a type of monster called "Worm".
